form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Moody introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to prohibit the admission of Chinese nationals as nonimmigrant students, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop Chinese Communist Prying by Vindicating Intellectual Safeguards in Academia Act of 2025 or the Stop CCP VISAs Act of 2025.

section.header: Prohibition on admission of Chinese nationals as nonimmigrant students
section.text: Section 214 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1184) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.header: Prohibition on admission of Chinese nationals as nonimmigrant students
subsection.text: An alien who is a national of the People's Republic of China may not be issued a visa or otherwise provided status as a nonimmigrant under section 101(a)(15)(F), (J), or (M), for the purpose of conducting research or pursuing a course of study.
